name: One Line - Stickman Story
description:
One Line - Stickman Story is an amazing puzzle game about Stickman’s adventure.

The rule is simple: Connect all the dots with only one line. The position of the starting point might be important. Think carefully before you start. As you pass the levels, Stickman’s adventure is moving forward. Find your lover and take good care of her!

You'll surely love this game once you get on how it works!

Features:
* FREE to play all levels anytime, anywhere
* 100+ funny stories in Stickman’s adventure
* 1000+ levels without repeat
* Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level
* Kill time - addicted to play with no pressure no push
* Suitable for both kids and adults to train logic skills

FREE DOWNLOAD NOW!
